fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Scry a player (Alive)
- Reveal a player's role (Dead)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Scrying a player causes them to visit the last player they visited
- Your first ability fails if they cannot visit the same player or your target is a Ghost
- Players do not know they are redirected
- Revealing a player's role reveals their role to all Ghosts
- You do not know the identity of other Ghosts, they do not know your identity
